00020 using namespace jma;
00021 using namespace std;

00023 class JMA_AnalyzerTest : public ::testing::Test
00024 {
00025 protected:
00026     virtual void SetUp() {
00027         analyzer_ = new JMA_Analyzer;
00028         ASSERT_TRUE(analyzer_ != NULL);
00029 
00030         knowledge_ = new JMA_Knowledge;
00031         ASSERT_TRUE(knowledge_);
00032 
00033         knowledge_->setSystemDict(TEST_JMA_DEFAULT_SYSTEM_DICT);
00034         knowledge_->addUserDict(TEST_JMA_DEFAULT_USER_DICT);
00035         ASSERT_EQ(1, knowledge_->loadDict());
00036         EXPECT_EQ(Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_UTF8, knowledge_->getEncodeType());
00037 
00038         ASSERT_EQ(1, analyzer_->setKnowledge(knowledge_));
00039     }
00040 
00041     virtual void TearDown() {
00042         delete analyzer_;
00043         delete knowledge_;
00044     }
00045 
00046     virtual void runWithSentenceTest(Analyzer* pAnalyzer) {
00047         Sentence sent;
00048         ASSERT_EQ(1, pAnalyzer->runWithSentence(sent));
00049         EXPECT_EQ(0, sent.getListSize());
00050         EXPECT_STREQ("", sent.getString());
00051 
00052         sent.setString("abc");
00053         ASSERT_EQ(1, pAnalyzer->runWithSentence(sent));
00054         ASSERT_EQ(1, sent.getListSize());
00055         EXPECT_EQ(1, sent.getCount(0));
00056         EXPECT_STREQ("abc", sent.getLexicon(0, 0));
00057         EXPECT_EQ(45, sent.getPOS(0, 0));
00058         EXPECT_STREQ("名詞,固有名詞,組織", sent.getStrPOS(0, 0));
00059         EXPECT_STREQ("abc", sent.getBaseForm(0, 0));
00060         EXPECT_STREQ("", sent.getReadForm(0, 0));
00061         EXPECT_STREQ("abc", sent.getNormForm(0, 0));
00062         EXPECT_EQ(1, sent.getScore(0));
00063         EXPECT_EQ(0, sent.getOneBestIndex());
00064 
00065         sent.setString("ソニー");
00066         ASSERT_EQ(1, pAnalyzer->runWithSentence(sent));
00067         ASSERT_EQ(1, sent.getListSize());
00068         EXPECT_EQ(1, sent.getCount(0));
00069         EXPECT_STREQ("ソニー", sent.getLexicon(0, 0));
00070         EXPECT_EQ(69, sent.getPOS(0, 0));
00071         EXPECT_STREQ("名詞,ユーザ", sent.getStrPOS(0, 0));
00072         EXPECT_STREQ("ソニー", sent.getBaseForm(0, 0));
00073         EXPECT_STREQ("", sent.getReadForm(0, 0));
00074         EXPECT_STREQ("ソニー", sent.getNormForm(0, 0));
00075         EXPECT_EQ(1, sent.getScore(0));
00076         EXPECT_EQ(0, sent.getOneBestIndex());
00077 
00078         sent.setString("来た");
00079         ASSERT_EQ(1, pAnalyzer->runWithSentence(sent));
00080         ASSERT_EQ(1, sent.getListSize());
00081         EXPECT_EQ(2, sent.getCount(0));
00082         EXPECT_STREQ("来", sent.getLexicon(0, 0));
00083         EXPECT_STREQ("た", sent.getLexicon(0, 1));
00084         EXPECT_EQ(31, sent.getPOS(0, 0));
00085         EXPECT_EQ(25, sent.getPOS(0, 1));
00086         EXPECT_STREQ("動詞,自立", sent.getStrPOS(0, 0));
00087         EXPECT_STREQ("助動詞", sent.getStrPOS(0, 1));
00088         EXPECT_STREQ("来る", sent.getBaseForm(0, 0));
00089         EXPECT_STREQ("た", sent.getBaseForm(0, 1));
00090         EXPECT_STREQ("き", sent.getReadForm(0, 0));
00091         EXPECT_STREQ("た", sent.getReadForm(0, 1));
00092         EXPECT_STREQ("来", sent.getNormForm(0, 0));
00093         EXPECT_STREQ("た", sent.getNormForm(0, 1));
00094         EXPECT_EQ(1, sent.getScore(0));
00095         EXPECT_EQ(0, sent.getOneBestIndex());
00096     }
00097 
00098     virtual void runWithStreamTest(const char* strInputFile, const char* strOutputFile)  {
00099         ofstream ofs(strInputFile);
00100         ASSERT_TRUE(ofs);
00101         ofs << "田中さんは三菱東京UFJ銀行に行った。" << endl;
00102         ofs << "どういう意味でしょうか？" << endl;
00103         ofs.close();
00104 
00105         ASSERT_EQ(1, analyzer_->runWithStream(strInputFile, strOutputFile));
00106     }
00107 
00108     JMA_Analyzer* analyzer_;
00109     JMA_Knowledge* knowledge_;
00110 };

00112 TEST_F(JMA_AnalyzerTest, setKnowledgeFail) {
00113     JMA_Knowledge* knowledge = new JMA_Knowledge;
00114     ASSERT_EQ(0, analyzer_->setKnowledge(knowledge));
00115     delete knowledge;
00116 }

00118 TEST_F(JMA_AnalyzerTest, runWithString) {
00119     EXPECT_STREQ("123/名詞,数  ", analyzer_->runWithString("123"));
00120     EXPECT_STREQ("本田総一郎/名詞,ユーザ  ", analyzer_->runWithString("本田総一郎"));
00121     EXPECT_STREQ("", analyzer_->runWithString(""));
00122 }

00125     runWithSentenceTest(analyzer_);
00126 }

00128 TEST_F(JMA_AnalyzerTest, loadMultipleKnowledge) {
00129     runWithSentenceTest(analyzer_);
00130 
00131     string strSysDict(TEST_JMA_DEFAULT_SYSTEM_DICT);
00132     strSysDict += "/../bin_eucjp";
00133     knowledge_->setSystemDict(strSysDict.c_str());
00134     EXPECT_EQ(1, knowledge_->loadDict());
00135     EXPECT_EQ(Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_EUCJP, knowledge_->getEncodeType());
00136     EXPECT_EQ(1, analyzer_->setKnowledge(knowledge_));
00137 
00138     knowledge_->setSystemDict(TEST_JMA_DEFAULT_SYSTEM_DICT);
00139     EXPECT_EQ(1, knowledge_->loadDict());
00140     EXPECT_EQ(Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_UTF8, knowledge_->getEncodeType());
00141     EXPECT_EQ(1, analyzer_->setKnowledge(knowledge_));
00142 
00143     runWithSentenceTest(analyzer_);
00144 }

00146 TEST_F(JMA_AnalyzerTest, multipleAnalyzer) {
00147     runWithSentenceTest(analyzer_);
00148 
00149     JMA_Analyzer* analyzer1 = new JMA_Analyzer;
00150     ASSERT_TRUE(analyzer1 != NULL);
00151     EXPECT_EQ(1, analyzer1->setKnowledge(knowledge_));
00152     runWithSentenceTest(analyzer1);
00153 
00154     JMA_Analyzer* analyzer2 = new JMA_Analyzer;
00155     ASSERT_TRUE(analyzer2 != NULL);
00156     EXPECT_EQ(1, analyzer2->setKnowledge(knowledge_));
00157     runWithSentenceTest(analyzer2);
00158 
00159     delete analyzer1;
00160     delete analyzer2;
00161 }

00163 TEST_F(JMA_AnalyzerTest, runWithStreamFail) {
00164     EXPECT_EQ(0, analyzer_->runWithStream("aaa", "bbb"));
00165     EXPECT_EQ(0, analyzer_->runWithStream("", "ccc"));
00166 }

00168 TEST_F(JMA_AnalyzerTest, runWithStream) {
00169     const char* strInputFile = "aaa.txt";
00170     const char* strOutputFile = "bbb.txt";
00171 
00172     runWithStreamTest(strInputFile, strOutputFile);
00173 
00174     ifstream ifs(strOutputFile);
00175     ASSERT_TRUE(ifs);
00176     string line;
00177     ASSERT_TRUE(getline(ifs, line));
00178     EXPECT_EQ("田中/名詞,固有名詞,人名,姓  さん/名詞,接尾,人名  は/助詞,係助詞  三菱東京UFJ銀行/名詞,ユーザ  に/助詞,格助詞,一般  行っ/動詞,自立  た/助動詞  。/記号,句点  ", line);
00179     ASSERT_TRUE(getline(ifs, line));
00180     EXPECT_EQ("どういう/連体詞  意味/名詞,サ変接続  でしょ/助動詞  う/助動詞  か/助詞,副助詞／並立助詞／終助詞  ？/記号,一般  ", line);
00181 
00182     EXPECT_TRUE(removeFile(strInputFile));
00183     EXPECT_TRUE(removeFile(strOutputFile));
00184 }

00186 TEST_F(JMA_AnalyzerTest, splitSentence) {
00187     vector<Sentence> sentVec;
00188     analyzer_->splitSentence("", sentVec);
00189     EXPECT_EQ(0u, sentVec.size());
00190 
00191     const char* paraStr = "aaaaa,bbbbb.ccccc!ddddd?ここ、そこ。こち、そち！これ、それ？";
00192     analyzer_->splitSentence(paraStr, sentVec);
00193     ASSERT_EQ(5u, sentVec.size());
00194     EXPECT_STREQ("aaaaa,bbbbb.ccccc!", sentVec[0].getString());
00195     EXPECT_STREQ("ddddd?", sentVec[1].getString());
00196     EXPECT_STREQ("ここ、そこ。", sentVec[2].getString());
00197     EXPECT_STREQ("こち、そち！", sentVec[3].getString());
00198     EXPECT_STREQ("これ、それ？", sentVec[4].getString());
00199 }

00201 TEST_F(JMA_AnalyzerTest, convertCharacters) {
00202     const char* str = "azAZ10ａｚＡＺ１０あんアンｲﾑ阿";
00203     EXPECT_EQ(str, analyzer_->convertCharacters(str));
00204 
00205     analyzer_->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_HIRAGANA, 1);
00206     analyzer_->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_HALF_WIDTH, 1);
00207     analyzer_->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_LOWER_CASE, 1);
00208     EXPECT_EQ("azaz10azaz10あんあんｲﾑ阿", analyzer_->convertCharacters(str));
00209 
00210     analyzer_->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_KATAKANA, 1);
00211     analyzer_->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_FULL_WIDTH, 1);
00212     analyzer_->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_UPPER_CASE, 1);
00213     EXPECT_EQ("ＡＺＡＺ１０ＡＺＡＺ１０アンアンｲﾑ阿", analyzer_->convertCharacters(str));
00214 }

00216 TEST_F(JMA_AnalyzerTest, nbest) {
00217     analyzer_->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_NBEST, 5);
00218     EXPECT_EQ(5, analyzer_->getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_NBEST));
00219 
00220     Sentence sent;
00221     ASSERT_EQ(1, analyzer_->runWithSentence(sent));
00222     EXPECT_EQ(0, sent.getListSize());
00223     EXPECT_STREQ("", sent.getString());
00224 
00225     sent.setString("abc");
00226     ASSERT_EQ(1, analyzer_->runWithSentence(sent));
00227     ASSERT_EQ(5, sent.getListSize());
00228 }

00230 TEST_F(JMA_AnalyzerTest, posFormatNone) {
00231     analyzer_->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_POS_TAGGING, 0);
00232     EXPECT_STREQ("123  ", analyzer_->runWithString("123"));
00233 
00234     runWithSentenceTest(analyzer_);
00235 
00236     const char* strInputFile = "aaa.txt";
00237     const char* strOutputFile = "bbb.txt";
00238 
00239     runWithStreamTest(strInputFile, strOutputFile);
00240 
00241     ifstream ifs(strOutputFile);
00242     ASSERT_TRUE(ifs);
00243     string line;
00244     ASSERT_TRUE(getline(ifs, line));
00245     EXPECT_EQ("田中  さん  は  三菱東京UFJ銀行  に  行っ  た  。  ", line);
00246     ASSERT_TRUE(getline(ifs, line));
00247     EXPECT_EQ("どういう  意味  でしょ  う  か  ？  ", line);
00248 
00249     EXPECT_TRUE(removeFile(strInputFile));
00250     EXPECT_TRUE(removeFile(strOutputFile));
00251 }

00253 TEST_F(JMA_AnalyzerTest, posFormatAlphabet) {
00254     analyzer_->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_POS_FORMAT_ALPHABET, 1);
00255     EXPECT_STREQ("123/NN  ", analyzer_->runWithString("123"));
00256 
00257     Sentence sent("abc");
00258     ASSERT_EQ(1, analyzer_->runWithSentence(sent));
00259     ASSERT_EQ(1, sent.getListSize());
00260     EXPECT_EQ(1, sent.getCount(0));
00261     EXPECT_STREQ("abc", sent.getLexicon(0, 0));
00262     EXPECT_EQ(45, sent.getPOS(0, 0));
00263     EXPECT_STREQ("NP-O", sent.getStrPOS(0, 0));
00264 
00265     const char* strInputFile = "aaa.txt";
00266     const char* strOutputFile = "bbb.txt";
00267 
00268     runWithStreamTest(strInputFile, strOutputFile);
00269 
00270     ifstream ifs(strOutputFile);
00271     ASSERT_TRUE(ifs);
00272     string line;
00273     ASSERT_TRUE(getline(ifs, line));
00274     EXPECT_EQ("田中/NP-S  さん/NS-H  は/PL-A  三菱東京UFJ銀行/N-USER  に/PL-G  行っ/V-I  た/AUV  。/EOS  ", line);
00275     ASSERT_TRUE(getline(ifs, line));
00276     EXPECT_EQ("どういう/AA  意味/N-VS  でしょ/AUV  う/AUV  か/PL-K  ？/S-G  ", line);
00277 
00278     EXPECT_TRUE(removeFile(strInputFile));
00279     EXPECT_TRUE(removeFile(strOutputFile));
00280 }

00282 TEST_F(JMA_AnalyzerTest, posFormatFull) {
00283     analyzer_->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_POS_FULL_CATEGORY, 1);
00284     EXPECT_STREQ("123/名詞,数,*,*  ", analyzer_->runWithString("123"));
00285 
00286     Sentence sent("abc");
00287     ASSERT_EQ(1, analyzer_->runWithSentence(sent));
00288     ASSERT_EQ(1, sent.getListSize());
00289     EXPECT_EQ(1, sent.getCount(0));
00290     EXPECT_STREQ("abc", sent.getLexicon(0, 0));
00291     EXPECT_EQ(45, sent.getPOS(0, 0));
00292     EXPECT_STREQ("名詞,固有名詞,組織,*", sent.getStrPOS(0, 0));
00293 
00294     const char* strInputFile = "aaa.txt";
00295     const char* strOutputFile = "bbb.txt";
00296 
00297     runWithStreamTest(strInputFile, strOutputFile);
00298 
00299     ifstream ifs(strOutputFile);
00300     ASSERT_TRUE(ifs);
00301     string line;
00302     ASSERT_TRUE(getline(ifs, line));
00303     EXPECT_EQ("田中/名詞,固有名詞,人名,姓  さん/名詞,接尾,人名,*  は/助詞,係助詞,*,*  三菱東京UFJ銀行/名詞,ユーザ,*,*  に/助詞,格助詞,一般,*  行っ/動詞,自立,*,*  た/助動詞,*,*,*  。/記号,句点,*,*  ", line);
00304     ASSERT_TRUE(getline(ifs, line));
00305     EXPECT_EQ("どういう/連体詞,*,*,*  意味/名詞,サ変接続,*,*  でしょ/助動詞,*,*,*  う/助動詞,*,*,*  か/助詞,副助詞／並立助詞／終助詞,*,*  ？/記号,一般,*,*  ", line);
00306 
00307     EXPECT_TRUE(removeFile(strInputFile));
00308     EXPECT_TRUE(removeFile(strOutputFile));
00309 }

00311 TEST_F(JMA_AnalyzerTest, compoundNotCombine) {
00312     const char* str = "高さ";
00313     EXPECT_STREQ("高さ/名詞,一般  ", analyzer_->runWithString(str));
00314     analyzer_->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_COMPOUND_MORPHOLOGY, 0);
00315     EXPECT_STREQ("高/形容詞,自立  さ/名詞,接尾,特殊  ", analyzer_->runWithString(str));
00316 }

00318 TEST_F(JMA_AnalyzerTest, userNounDecompose) {
00319     const char* str = "野球選手権大会";
00320     EXPECT_STREQ("野球選手権大会/名詞,ユーザ  ", analyzer_->runWithString(str));
00321     analyzer_->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_DECOMPOSE_USER_NOUN, 1);
00322     EXPECT_STREQ("野球/名詞,ユーザ  選手権/名詞,ユーザ  大会/名詞,ユーザ  ", analyzer_->runWithString(str));
00323 }
